Uses of Class
core.FileSet

  • Packages that use FileSet 
    Package Description
    app
    Contains the Application class which is the foundation class for the entire application.
    core
    Core classes necessary for the base operations involved in Mirror including FileSet (defines properties and methods for manipulating the settings for a Mirror operation) as well the FileOps class (provides standard mirroring operations).
    ui
    Contains user interface classes.

    • Uses of FileSet in app

      Fields in app declared as FileSet 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private FileSet Application.mCurrentFileSet
      Holds the active FileSet (the "Model") that both the UIViewController (the View-Controller) will interact with as well as the model that the FileOps class uses for its operations.
      Methods in app that return FileSet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileSet Application.getCurrentFileSet()
      Method to retrieve the current FileSet from the application context.
      Methods in app with parameters of type FileSet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Application.setCurrentFileSet(FileSet fileSet)
      Takes a FileSet and sets it as the current FileSet for the application to operate on.

    • Uses of FileSet in core

      Fields in core declared as FileSet 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private FileSet FileOps.mFilesToCopy
      Contains the FileSet that the copy process will operate on.
      Methods in core that return FileSet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FileSet FileSet.read(java.lang.String fullPathToFile)
      Factory method that instantiates a FileSet by reading the contents of a file on disk from the path specified and constructs a FileSet object from the contents of the file
      Methods in core with parameters of type FileSet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Boolean FileOps.backupExists(FileSet fs)
      Utility function that checks if a particular FileSet exists on the file system.
      static java.lang.Boolean FileOps.cannotWrite(FileSet fs)
      Utility function that tests if the destination directory specified in a FileSet can be written to (it must exist and have sufficient permissions to be written to).
      static void FileSet.save(java.lang.String fullPathToFile, FileSet fileSet)
      Saves a FileSet to a directory.
      static void FileOps.validateFileSet(FileSet files) 
      Constructors in core with parameters of type FileSet 
      Constructor and Description
      FileOps(FileSet files)
      Constructor that takes a FileSet to conduct operations on.
      FileOps(FileSet files, FileOpsMessageHandler handler)
      Constructor that takes a FileSet to conduct operations with and a FileOpsMessageHandler that will take call-backs with Progress updates as the operation progresses.

    • Uses of FileSet in ui

      Fields in ui declared as FileSet 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private FileSet UIViewController.mCurrentFileSet
      The current file set.
